title: Mercury in Capricorn
summary: Thinking turns strategic and disciplined. Communication favors organization, timelines, and accountable commitments. The opportunity is to make plans that stand up to scrutiny without turning rigid.

meaning.headline: Mind focuses on structure, responsibility, and practical outcomes.

frames.text: Mercury in Capricorn supports clear planning, prioritization, and measured speech.
Decisions lean on evidence and long-term viability.
Boundaries and roles become clearer in conversation.
Tone may be concise or serious, valuing efficiency.
Pragmatism means creativity or empathy are irrelevant.

frictions: Withholding feedback until it is too late

do: Map tasks with clear deadlines and owners.
Use concise summaries followed by action items.
Check assumptions with data before deciding.
Make space for feedback from the team.
avoid: Using authority to shut down dialogue
Delaying communication until everything is perfect

reusable_lines.text: Structure is helpful when it leaves room for people.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can strengthen planning and accountability
Agency-forward language: you choose how to set boundaries and goals
Contextual framing: efficiency helps when aligned with capacity

sources: Mercury as mind/communication archetype in daily cycles
